cat1.name: Musical Technique / Execution
cat1.description: Tightness among band members, clean playing, correctness of notes, rhythm accuracy, dynamic control, balance between instruments

cat1.name: Creativity & Originality / Arrangement
cat1.description: Interesting song arrangements, originality or novel interpretations

cat1.name: Vocal / Singing (if applicable)
cat1.description: Quality of lead and backing vocals, blending, diction, pitch, harmony

cat1.name: Stage Presence & Showmanship
cat1.description: Engagement with audience, movement, confidence, charisma

cat1.name: Set Flow / Pacing & Use of Time
cat1.description: Smooth transitions between songs, effective use of time

cat1.name: Sound / Balance / Mix
cat1.description: Balance between instruments and vocals, clarity, dynamics

cat1.name: Bonus / Intangibles
cat1.description: Improvisation, risk-taking, audience reaction, overall impression

cat2.name: Vocal Quality / Tone
cat2.description: Warmth, resonance, consistency throughout vocal range

cat2.name: Pitch & Intonation / Accuracy
cat2.description: Hitting correct notes, staying in tune, control through transitions

cat2.name: Breath Control / Support / Dynamics
cat2.description: Ability to sustain phrases, control of dynamics

cat2.name: Stage Presence / Performance
cat2.description: Confidence, connection with audience, movement, expression

cat2.name: Song Choice / Difficulty / Originality
cat2.description: Appropriateness of song, difficulty level, originality
